quest.name: And Then There Were None
journal:
 Quest Sync
Trepidation is writ plain on Lad Kenn's face.
objectives: With the chat mode in Say, enter “Lad Kenn” to call out to the pixie.

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: No, this is not the time for tears. If we hurry, we might still prevent the unthinkable from coming to pass.

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: You see, the marble─it was Kenn Gyuf's treasure, and Uin Hagan had always wanted one like it.

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: Now, Uin Hagan went to collect the marble near the lake, yes? I will give chase and try to find them.

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: Meanwhile, I need you to return to Phisor Lran to see if there's any change with the beaver. Afterwards, let us meet at the stables yonder.

dialogue.name: BEAVERA03397
dialogue.text: <squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It seems to be saying, “I love milk. Thank you.”

dialogue.name: BEAVERB03397
dialogue.text: <squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It seems to be saying, “The marble is pretty. Thank you.”

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: <sigh> Try as I might, I couldn't find Uin Hagan. What of the beaver?

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: What!? Uin Hagan too!? It's my fault! It's all my fault! <sob>

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: ...No, it's the beaver that's to blame! It's all that accursed creature's doing! Grrr, I'm going to teach it a lesson it'll never forget!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Lad Kenn flies off in the direction of Phisor Lran. You can't help but have a bad feeling about this...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Lad Kenn

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “Lad Kenn” to call out to the enraged pixie.

dialogue.name: BEAVERC03397
dialogue.text: <squeal> <squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It seems to be saying, “I found my friends. Thank you. Seek out Nee Ys─they will give you a reward in my stead.”

dialogue.name: BEAVERC03397
dialogue.text: <squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It continues, “If Nee Ys proves uncooperative, however, tell them I've hidden my lovely pair of shoes inside the roof.”

dialogue.name: BEAVERA03397
dialogue.text: <squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It seems to be saying, “I love milk. Thank you.”

dialogue.name: BEAVERB03397
dialogue.text: <squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It seems to be saying, “The marble is pretty. Thank you.”

dialogue.name: BEAVERC03397
dialogue.text: <squeal> <squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It seems to be saying, “I found my friends. Thank you. Seek out Nee Ys─they will give you a reward in my stead.”

dialogue.name: BEAVERC03397
dialogue.text: <squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It continues, “If Nee Ys proves uncooperative, however, tell them I've hidden my lovely pair of shoes inside the roof.”

dialogue.name: NEEYS
dialogue.text: Hm? You want to play, do you?

dialogue.name: NEEYS
dialogue.text: ...Is that so? Well, it's got naught to do with me. I don't owe you anything.

dialogue.name: NEEYS
dialogue.text: If you want a reward, you must play with me first. It's only fair. Let's see, now... Yes, a couple of years ought to do it.

dialogue.name: NEEYS
dialogue.text: ...Truly!? Oh, those shoes are the loveliest! When Lad Kenn flaunted them, it made me so jealous! Ah, to think that they'll be mine now!

dialogue.name: NEEYS
dialogue.text: Here's a little something by way of thanks! With that, I'm off to collect my shoes! Tee hee!
